content.rendered:
HELPING HOMEOWNERS AND BUSINESSES MAKE THE SWITCH TO SOLAR HASSLE FREE AND AFFORDABLE!

Our expert energy advisors will help you compare, contrast, and make the best decision tailored to your home or businesses energy needs.

Find Out How

SolarState is a CEC Approved Solar Retailer, adhering to the Clean Energy Council Code of Conduct, the only code of conduct authorised by the Australian Competition & Consumer Commission.

We are transparent with our pricing, deliver on the best service possible and will design your energy-efficiency plan to suit your budget and energy demands.

Our energy expert team will evaluate, design, and install your solar system on your home or business to ensure you are getting the most out of your investment.

We select all our manufacturers and partners based on quality and affordability. And with our Service First approach, integrity is maintained at all times. 

SOLAR PANELS

Want to reduce your power bill? Solar is the perfect way to do it! We can help you install solar panels and batteries in your home or business, so you can start saving money right away. Our team is experienced in renewable energy systems, so you can be sure the job will be done right. 

SolarState offers homeowners and business owners an affordable and high-quality solar energy system. Our solar panels are the highest quality and our installers are the best in the business. We make it easy for you to go solar with a hassle-free installation process.

 
Find Out How

WHY TRUST SOLARSTATE

We are a solar energy company with 7+ years of experience helping homeowners and businesses understand the wide ranging benefits of solar energy. We offer a personal experience from start to finish. We take the time to understand your needs and find the perfect solar solution for your home or business. We always offer the best price possible and deliver significant savings on your electricity bills. Our expert team is always available to help our customers maximise their savings.

We believe that renewable energy is key to a sustainable future, and our mission is to make solar energy more accessible and affordable for everyone! By providing easy access to information and education for renewable energy, we make the process simple and straightforward.

 

OUR MISSION IS TO TRANSFORM…

the way people adopt solar energy and to educate families and businesses about all of the benefits of going solar. Our goal is to simplify the process of switching to renewable energy, bringing transparency and ease through the information and services we share with our clients. 

What makes SolarState different is our commitment to quality and customer service; And we only use the best components in our systems. We offer financing options that make solar energy more affordable than ever before. We know you’ll be impressed with what SolarState has to offer.

For your first choice for solar and batteries…

Talk with One of Our Expert Team Today!

Our Recent Projects

HOW IT WORKS

Get a free home and business energy efficiency assessment from our experts! All our Solar and Battery advisors are certified energy performance assessors and will help you save money on your energy bills.

Our energy expert advisors will work with you to design a custom solar system, based on your home or business’s power usage. All our systems are tested, and we guarantee the performance of every system we sell.

We will put together a reliable and affordable energy plan. We will come to your home or business to present the best option according to your needs.

Once approvals, permits and guarantees are granted the solar system is installed.

Find Out How

Real Victorian Families – Solar Savings, Energy Independence

SolarState Has Helped Over 7,300 Homeowners

Make your home or business energy independent and your family financially better off!

OUR SIX-POINT PLAN GUARANTEES

  • Solar Panel Efficiency
  • Solar Panel Cost
  • PV Module Quality and Warranty
  • Manufacturing – Country of Origin
  • Solar Panel Specifications
  • Aesthetics (How the Solar Panels Look)

CONTACT US

We make it easy for you to find the best solar deal for your home or business energy needs.
